reviews.review: If you wanna spend half of your life inside playing a game and spending thousands on keyboards through out your life time and scared of the sun. This game is for you! Plus you will order kebabs on the weekend. >;3
im not good at this game, but I enjoy it a lot.
playing alone cheats pls dont play csgo and waste u time
Jueguen cs no valorant háganse hombres

CS is like playing a game of BeanBoozled, You might get something great with your luck but in this game you don't have luck so you are always being given the shittiest flavors. Hope you like the taste of shit because it's gonna stay in your mouth until you splurge 5k hours of your life into this game. Even then you will probably be shit and that is fine but more time for you to ruin your enjoyment and love of CS. Thanks for coming to my Ted Talk
BALL NUTS IN MY BABY BOTTOMS
Estoy cansado de enseñarles a mis amigos a jugar este juego, pongan un tutorial por favor así no rezongo más, gracias!
these game passes are shit, better spend the same amount on skins
MUITA ATUALIZAÇÃO, SEMPRE ACONTECE UMA COISA E TRAVA
Waste of your life and money 10/10 dont buy it

Se tem amigos pra jogar junto, ignore o jogo de tiro e brinque de pique esconde que tem nas oficinas da steam (recomendo o mapa seek haus).
Sinceramente o jogo é divertido mas se for começar a jogar um FPS recomendo mais o valorant, mas você ainda pode preferir  o CS por ter um estilo de jogo mais "pé no chão", abraços e se for jogar use e abuse dos mapas da comunidade.

i dont like the mmr points goes i played almost 5 to 6 wins streak and still not ranking up then i just lost two game and i got de ranked its unfair
its a classic, if u dont like it u have no soul
味道很好，家里人也觉得CSgo是他们见过最成功的恐怖游戏

CSGO是绝对公平的（开挂除外),所有的皮肤都没有属性加成，我花了一大堆钱在上面主要就是看到队友的刀可以转。。。。。
上次我给朋友推荐的时候，我说我有刀，他问我要多少钱，我说：500多，他说：没用啊。又没加成。。。所以不要和不懂得人谈刀和饰品，血压分分钟暴增。话说回来，这款游戏的入门并不容易，它并不会因为你打的菜就匹配菜的对手，所以我入门的时候常常被虐杀，刀死，电死。直到有一天，有一个人骂骂咧咧的来电我，我一枪爆了他的头，我才发现我不是菜鸡了。当你可以享受电人的啊♂声时，恭喜你，你已经会玩这个游戏了。还有，我要对菜鸡们说：没事的，多练练。都是菜过来的。只是别买枪皮，你还不知道自己适合什么枪，买了也是白买。

this game is the bane of my existence

10/10 fun times!

The time I spent playing this game could've been spent...
...studying
...applying for jobs
...making friends irl
...getting a gf
...spending time with my family
...working out
...becoming a better man in general

From the time I spent in this game, I got...
...an extremely racist and homophobic vocabulary
...free Russian lessons
...anger management issues
...borderline autistic tendencies
...sleep deprivation
10/10 would never uninstall this game and correct my life

900+ hours on eu servers, 900+ hours listening to people form eastern europe screaming at me

10/10 would recomend
